question: What is the legal name of your organization?
follow_up: Thank you! I'll be helping {company_name} establish its AI Management System.
validation: Please provide your organization's legal name.

question: Which industry sector(s) does your organization operate in? (e.g., Financial Services, Healthcare, Manufacturing, Technology, Government, etc.)
follow_up: Excellent! The {industry_sector} sector has specific AI regulatory considerations we'll address.
validation: Please specify your primary industry sector.

question: What is your organization's size? (Number of employees and annual revenue if comfortable sharing)
follow_up: Perfect! This helps us scale the AIMS appropriately for your organization.
validation: Please provide your organization size (at least employee count).

question: In which countries/regions does your organization operate? (List all locations where you have operations or serve customers)
follow_up: Noted! We'll ensure compliance with regulations in {geographic_operations}.
validation: Please list your operational geographies.

question: Does your organization currently use AI/ML systems? If yes, briefly describe the main use cases.
follow_up: Thank you! This gives us a clear picture of your current AI landscape.
validation: Please indicate if you use AI and describe any current use cases.

question: What is your AI development stage? (e.g., Exploring AI, Piloting, Production deployment, Scaling AI across organization)
follow_up: Great! We'll tailor the AIMS to your {ai_development_stage} maturity level.
validation: Please describe your AI development stage.

question: How many AI systems/models are currently in: a) Production, b) Development/Testing, c) Planning phase?
follow_up: Excellent! This helps us understand the scope of AI systems to manage.
validation: Please provide approximate numbers for each category.

question: In which areas do you use or plan to use AI? (e.g., Customer service, Risk assessment, Product development, Operations, HR, Marketing)
follow_up: Perfect! We'll ensure coverage for all these AI application areas.
validation: Please list your AI application areas.

question: Who are your key stakeholders regarding AI usage? (e.g., Customers, Regulators, Board, Employees, Partners, Investors)
follow_up: Understood! We'll address {key_stakeholders} requirements in the AIMS.
validation: Please identify your key AI stakeholders.

question: Which AI-related regulations apply to your organization? (e.g., EU AI Act, GDPR, CCPA, sector-specific regulations)
follow_up: Important! We'll ensure AIMS compliance with {regulatory_requirements}.
validation: Please list applicable AI regulations.

question: Do you hold any ISO certifications or management system standards? (e.g., ISO 27001, ISO 9001, ISO 27701, SOC2)
follow_up: Excellent! We can integrate with your existing {existing_certifications} systems.
validation: Please list any current certifications or 'None' if not applicable.

question: Do your customers or contracts have specific AI requirements? (e.g., transparency, fairness, explainability, data privacy)
follow_up: Noted! Customer requirements will be incorporated into the AIMS design.
validation: Please describe any customer AI requirements.

question: What should the AIMS cover? (e.g., Entire organization, Specific business units, Specific AI products/services)
follow_up: Perfect! We'll define the AIMS boundary for {aims_scope_coverage}.
validation: Please specify the intended scope coverage.

question: Are you seeking ISO 42001 certification or implementing for internal governance only?
follow_up: Understood! We'll prepare accordingly for your {certification_intent} objective.
validation: Please indicate: Certification or Internal governance.

question: Which AI systems are highest priority for AIMS coverage? (List top 3-5 systems)
follow_up: Great! We'll prioritize these systems in our implementation approach.
validation: Please list your priority AI systems.

question: Who will be the executive sponsor for the AIMS? (Name and role)
follow_up: Excellent! Having {executive_sponsor} as sponsor ensures strong leadership commitment.
validation: Please identify the executive sponsor.

question: Do you have an existing AI governance structure? (e.g., AI Ethics Committee, AI Risk Committee, Data Governance Board)
follow_up: Thank you! We'll work with your existing governance structure.
validation: Please describe current AI governance or indicate 'None'.

question: Do you have an AI Policy or AI Ethics principles? If yes, when were they last updated?
follow_up: Noted! We'll review and align with your existing AI policy framework.
validation: Please describe your AI policy status.

question: How do you currently assess AI-related risks? (e.g., Formal process, Ad-hoc, Not yet established)
follow_up: Good to know! We'll build on your {risk_assessment_process} approach.
validation: Please describe your AI risk assessment approach.

question: Have you experienced any AI-related incidents or issues? (e.g., Bias complaints, Model failures, Data breaches)
follow_up: Thank you for sharing. This helps us focus on critical risk areas.
validation: Please indicate Yes/No and brief description if applicable.

question: Which impact assessments do you perform for AI? (e.g., Privacy (DPIA), Ethical, Algorithmic, None yet)
follow_up: Understood! We'll ensure proper impact assessment coverage.
validation: Please list current impact assessments or 'None'.

question: How many people work directly with AI in your organization? (Include data scientists, ML engineers, AI governance roles)
follow_up: Perfect! This helps us understand your AI capability and resource needs.
validation: Please provide approximate team size.

question: Do you have a defined budget for AIMS implementation? (Range is fine, helps us recommend appropriate solutions)
follow_up: Thank you! We'll provide recommendations within your budget parameters.
validation: Please indicate budget range or 'To be determined'.

question: What is your target timeline for AIMS implementation? (e.g., 3 months, 6 months, 12 months)
follow_up: Great! We'll create a roadmap for your {implementation_timeline} timeline.
validation: Please provide your target timeline.

question: What are your primary data sources for AI? (e.g., Internal databases, Third-party data, Public datasets, Real-time streams)
follow_up: Excellent! Data governance will cover these {data_sources}.
validation: Please list your main AI data sources.

question: What AI/ML platforms and tools do you use? (e.g., Cloud AI services, Open-source frameworks, Commercial platforms)
follow_up: Perfect! We'll ensure AIMS compatibility with your AI tech stack.
validation: Please list your main AI development tools.

question: Do you use third-party AI services or models? (e.g., OpenAI, Google AI, AWS AI, vendor solutions)
follow_up: Important! We'll include third-party AI governance in the AIMS.
validation: Please list any third-party AI services used.

question: What are your top 3 objectives for implementing ISO 42001? (e.g., Compliance, Customer trust, Risk reduction, Competitive advantage)
follow_up: Excellent! We'll ensure the AIMS delivers on these key objectives.
validation: Please list your top 3 AIMS objectives.

question: How will you measure AIMS success? (What KPIs or outcomes are most important?)
follow_up: Perfect! We'll build these metrics into the AIMS performance evaluation.
validation: Please describe your success criteria.

question: What are your most immediate AI governance concerns or pain points?
follow_up: Thank you! We'll prioritize addressing these concerns early in implementation.
validation: Please share your immediate AI governance concerns.
